title: The Die hard: the legend of Lasseter's lost gold reef
creator_credit: Supreme Films, David Crocker and Venture Films
brief_description: Reconstructs the story of Harold Lasseter’s prospecting expeditions in Western Australia and his later searches for the reef of gold he claimed to have seen in 1897, up to his death in the attempt in 1930.
title_for_label: The Die hard: the legend of Lasseter’s lost gold reef
